name: Nelathar's soup
description:
Nelathar's soup

Nelathar's soup, a proverb named after the old emperor. The emperor who killed his entire family through poisoned soup in an effort to kill a rival.  

Take the role of King Nileas of Iludas, trying to find a way to save his kingdom from imminent destruction. Can you find a way to save your kingdom without serving Nelathar's soup?
